pr_title: Include JAVA_VENDOR, J9PRODUCT_NAME, J9JDK_EXT_VERSION in javacore

timeline.message:
Include JAVA_VENDOR, J9PRODUCT_NAME, J9JDK_EXT_VERSION in javacore

These defines are set by openj9_version_info.h from the extensions.

Signed-off-by: Peter Shipton <Peter_Shipton@ca.ibm.com>

timeline.bodyText: Can you remove the trailing whitespace while you're here, please.
timeline.author: keithc-ca

replies.bodyText: Yes, but perhaps you should just remove it from every file in one go so we can be done with this in existing code.
replies.author: pshipton

replies.bodyText: Sadly, trailing whitespace seems to come back quite quickly: I think we would need to augment the 'line-end check' to avoid that.
replies.author: keithc-ca
